Canadians work an average of 1,702 hours: Average annual working hours in Canada Canadians work 1702 hours per year
Annual working hours per employee (worldwide) Country Average hours per year Canada 1,669h Cayman Islands 2,184h Chile 2,101h China 2,397h
Average annual working hours in Canada Canadians work 1702 hours per year

Well against Mexico we're not even close - Canadians clock up 1,702 hours at work a year, 548 hours less than our Mexican counterparts. And while it's slightly less than the OECD average it's still more than our neighbours across the ditch and those in the mother country.
